Summary: looked about 2x brighter than international space station does. object headed nw curved to the ne. plane located to the north of it.
divs: sighting detailsdriving to work. star like object very bright headed nw then curved to ne direction. plane located about 5 miles north of this objects location. location near addison\devils lake michigan area. as soon as direction changed object light or reflective light no longer could be seen.
